Class DriveTrain4VictorEncGyro

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
      • org.usfirst.frc.team4001.robot.subsystems.DriveTrain
        • org.usfirst.frc.team4001.robot.subsystems.DriveTrain4Victor
          • org.usfirst.frc.team4001.robot.subsystems.DriveTrain4VictorEnc
            • org.usfirst.frc.team4001.robot.subsystems.DriveTrain4VictorEncGyro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncodedDrive, GyroDrive, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.NamedSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class DriveTrain4VictorEncGyro
extends DriveTrain4VictorEnc
implements GyroDrive
    4 Victor motor drivetrain with encoders and gyro. Includes pid controlled driveStraight method
    Author:
    eric
    See Also:
    *@see DriveTrain4Victor, DriveTrain4VictorEnc, GyroDrive

      • driveStraight

        public void driveStraight(double setPoint,
                          double speed,
                          double setAngle,
                          double epsilon)
        Using both PID controllers (drive & gyro), the drivetrain will move to target at given speed and angle
        Parameters:
        setPoint - The set point in inches
        speed - The speed (0.0 to 1.0)
        setAngle - The set angle in degrees
        epsilon - How close robot should be to target to consider reached
